original_title: News1st wins Best News Bulletin of the Year at Raigam Tele Awards 2022
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – News 1st claimed four awards at the 19th Raigam Tele Awards 2022 held in Colombo on Saturday evening (25).
TV1's Naveksha Gunasekara won the award for the Best News Reader (English) for the year 2022.
Sonali Wanigabaduge, the host of The People's Platform, was adjudged Best Television Presenter (English) for the year 2022.
Randika Hettiarachchi won the Outstanding Documentary of the Year award for 'Wasgamu Vismaya'.
Shakthi TV's Gnanakumar Ganadeepan won the award for Best Television Presenter (Tamil).
And 'Sajjayanaa' won the award for Outstanding Music Programme of the year.
